titles.title: Gun Safety Act of 1993
To amend the Consumer Product Safety Act to authorize the Consumer Product Safety Commission to regulate the risk of injury associated with firearms.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H7703-7704)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Consumer Protection and Competitiveness.

bill.summary: 10/12/1993--Introduced. Gun Safety Act of 1993 - Amends the Consumer Product Safety Act to allow the Consumer Product Safety Commission to regulate the risk of injury associated with firearms. Prohibits the Commission from banning firearms as hazardous products.
